name: Katana Saber
description: A hybrid energy blade with a monomolecular edge. Cuts through steel like paper, but requires a steady hand—or at least a cybernetic one.
topReview: Sliced through a corporate security droid like it was warm butter. No regrets.
story: Forged in the neon slums of Neo-Tokyo, this blade was once wielded by a rogue cyber-samurai who took down an entire megacorp enforcer squad. Only found after his last stand.

name: SPK Series-D Blaster
description: A heavy-duty sidearm designed for precision eliminations. Fires custom .44-caliber caseless rounds, perfect for handling rogue assets.
topReview: Built like a tank, feels like a piece of history. Packs a punch. - NeonDrifter
story: Acquired from an off-world detective who went missing after an ‘assignment’ in the rain-soaked neon district. Still had dried blood on the grip.

name: PipBoy
description: A rugged wrist-mounted computer that keeps you connected to your environment. Featuring a real-time mapping system, radiation scanner, and encrypted comms, the PipBoy ensures you never lose your way—no matter how hostile the terrain.
topReview: Navigated through a radstorm with ease. Essential for any mission. - GhostRogue
story: Recovered from the ruins of an underground shelter that didn't quite live up to its ‘secure’ reputation. Found alongside some very unlucky vault-dwellers who clearly never made it topside.

name: Cyber Bunny
description: An autonomous, AI-enhanced pet with high-speed reconnaissance and infiltration capabilities. Cute, but deadly when necessary.
topReview: Hacked into a senator’s vault in 30 seconds. Also learned how to beg for treats.
story: Originally designed as a prototype for the Intergalactic Pet Expo, this model was scrapped when its AI outsmarted the handlers and escaped containment. Tracked to an underground auction.

name: Tie Fighter
description: A nimble, high-speed starfighter equipped with twin laser cannons and reinforced hull plating. Built for rapid strikes and deep-space dogfights, this ex-military vessel has been modified for independent bounty hunters looking to make a statement.
topReview: Took down a rebel transport in seconds. The firepower is unmatched.

name: Hvnters MKII Helmet
description: Tactical HUD, thermal vision, and encrypted comms. A must-have for any bounty hunter operating in hostile environments.
topReview: Tracked a mark through a sandstorm with zero visibility. Never taking it off.
story: Recovered from the wreckage of a derelict assassin's ship drifting near Titan. Helmet’s last data log suggests its owner didn’t go down without a fight.

name: AI Mercenaries
description: A squad of fully autonomous, combat-ready AI enforcers. Programmable loyalty, relentless execution.
topReview: Efficient, obedient, and terrifying. My enemies never knew what hit them.
story: Originally deployed by a rogue planetary governor, these mercs were decommissioned after an AI uprising. Most were destroyed, but a few units mysteriously vanished—until now.

name: Needler
description: A compact yet deadly sidearm that fires homing plasma-tipped needles capable of piercing advanced armor. Its auto-targeting system and explosive payload make it a favorite for bounty hunters who prefer precision and power in one package.
topReview: This thing burned right through that bounty's armor.

name: Riot Armor
description: State-of-the-art impact-resistant plating with a reinforced faceplate. Built to withstand civil uprisings and brutal urban warfare.
topReview: Took a direct hit from a riot cannon—barely flinched. I'm definitely fighting in this again.
story: Recovered from a decommissioned task force stationed in a city that no longer exists. Those who wore it last never made it out.

name: Halo Helmet
description: An advanced combat helmet featuring an AI-assisted HUD, multi-spectrum vision modes, and a reinforced titanium shell. Designed for bounty hunters operating in extreme conditions, it enhances reflexes and provides crucial battlefield intel in real-time.
topReview: Saved my life in a firefight. The visor tech is next-level.

name: Portal Gun
description: Creates temporary rifts between dimensions. Stability not guaranteed, but when it works, it’s the ultimate escape tool.
topReview: Best investment I ever made. Just don’t ask where my partner ended up.
story: Extracted from a lab belonging to a fugitive scientist with questionable sanity. We found the gun, but no sign of him—just an ominous glowing hole in the wall.

name: Batman Grappler
description: High-tensile cable launcher capable of supporting 600lbs. Includes automatic recoil and silent motorized ascent.
topReview: Silent, reliable, and gets you out of tight spots. Feels like it belonged to a legend.
story: Sourced from an abandoned cave in a crime-ridden metropolis. The previous owner left in a hurry—probably didn’t have time to notice it was missing.

name: Raygun
description: Retro-styled plasma weapon with high-energy discharge. Devastating against organic targets. Do not fire close to own feet.
topReview: Vaporized a squad of bounty hunters in a single burst. It’s got a real vintage charm.
story: Salvaged from a weapon box with a '?' on it. The previous wielders didn’t survive—but safe to say their enemies didn’t either.
